content.webTitle: Peter Greenaway on bringing Da Vinci's Last Supper to life

fields.headline: Peter Greenaway on bringing Da Vinci's Last Supper to life
fields.bodyText: British filmmaker Peter Greenaway brought to life Leonardo Da Vinci's The Last Supper in Milan on Monday night, as part of a series of projects to animate classic works of art. In front of an intimate invited audience - and for one night only - Greenaway used lighting, projections and music to transform the fresco into a spectacle suitable, he said, for "the laptop generation".
